
User::find() -- returns a scope obj

foreach($scope as $obj)
  // ...


foreach($scope->all() as $obj)
  // ...

User::find()->online->admin(false)->paginate($params['page']);
  

User::find();
User::find()->all();
User::find()->first();
User::find()->paginate($page, $per_page = 10);
User::find()->each(function($user) { ... });
User::find()->batched(function($users) { ... });



$users = User::find()->online()->asc_by_name()->paginate($params['page']);

$user = User::get($params['id']);

$user->photos()->all();
$user->photos()->first();
$user->photos()->paginate($params['page']);
$user->photos()->paginate($params['page']);
